trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Imposta l'identità dell'utente per un'applicazione ASP.NET quando è abilitata l'autenticazione basata su form.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule imposta corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per un <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto che rappresenta l'identità dell'utente per l'oggetto corrente è richiesta quando l'autenticazione <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>nel [authentication Element (Schema delle impostazioni ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) elemento del file di configurazione dell'applicazione.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule espone un <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento che consente di fornire un personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>per la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>eventi sono possibile specificare una subroutine denominata **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the FormsAuthenticationModule is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, tramite il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>FormsAuthenticationModule non è supportata.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui problemi di compatibilità in modalità integrata, vedere [lo spostamento di un'applicazione ASP.NET da IIS 6.0 a IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore non è destinato a essere chiamato dal codice dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: In ASP.NET viene chiamato questo costruttore per creare un'istanza della <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato il costruttore, viene chiamato il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>metodo per inizializzare la nuova <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>oggetto.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'applicazione autentica la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato l'evento di autenticazione durante la <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile gestire l'evento di autenticazione del <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>classe specificando una subroutine denominata **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà specificato per il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>su un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà durante il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** viene utilizzato l'evento, l'identità fornita dal ticket di autenticazione form nel cookie o URL.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Il **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento viene generato solo quando la modalità di autenticazione è impostata su <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>nel [authentication Element (Schema delle impostazioni ASP.NET)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) elemento del file di configurazione dell'applicazione e <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>è un modulo HTTP attivo per l'applicazione.</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse, tranne la memoria, usate per il <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere chiamato dal codice dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza il <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere chiamato dal codice dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di inizializzazione assicura che il <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>è incluso nell'elaborazione del <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>eventi.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> istanza.
